Data Transfer Object representing an integrated tool's response data for external API communication.

## Key Components

- **ToolResponse** - Main DTO class with comprehensive tool metadata
- **Tool Identification** - `id`, `name`, `description`, and `icon` fields
- **Tool Classification** - `type`, `toolType`, `category`, and `platformCategory` for organizing tools
- **Operational Data** - `toolUrls` (List<ToolUrlResponse>) and `credentials` (ToolCredentialsResponse)
- **Status Management** - `enabled` boolean flag for tool availability
- **Lombok Annotations** - `@Data`, `@Builder`, `@NoArgsConstructor`, `@AllArgsConstructor` for boilerplate reduction
- **OpenAPI Documentation** - Comprehensive `@Schema` annotations for API documentation

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a tool response
ToolResponse response = ToolResponse.builder()
    .id("tool-123")
    .name("tactical-rmm")
    .description("Remote monitoring and management tool")
    .type("rmm")
    .category("monitoring")
    .platformCategory("web")
    .enabled(true)
    .toolUrls(urlList)
    .credentials(credentialsResponse)
    .build();

// Using in REST controller
@GetMapping("/tools/{id}")
public ToolResponse getTool(@PathVariable String id) {
    return toolService.getToolById(id);
}
```
